content.p: Our course will develop your expertise and skills in the key areas of physics. We also offer great flexibility which allows you to tailor your study to a specialist area of your choice, including astronomy, nanoscience, medical physics or theoretical physics. Many of our courses include opportunities to study at a partner university overseas, or spend a year working on an industry placement. Browse undergraduate courses in Physics and Astronomy For those who don't yet meet the entry requirements We offer a range of scholarships and bursaries Visit our beautiful campus and explore the opportunities for studying Physics and Astronomy at Nottingham. A full programme of lectures, tours, demonstration experiments plus advice on UCAS applications. Physics and Astronomy Blog Keep up-to-date with what's happening around the school with this new blog written by our staff and students. Fees and funding The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
